summary: Provides a CouplerMapping class that translates MODFLOW 6 grid cells and well information into MetaSWAP SVAT unit identifiers, creating the required coupling input file and optionally handling well sprinkling configurations.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration between groundwater (MODFLOW 6) and surfaceâ€‘water (MetaSWAP) models for coupled hydrological simulations, improving data exchange and model coordination.
